attributes.title: GTA V - Rocket Race
attributes.description: A team with cars and flare guns must get across Los Santos while pursued by another team with Savage helicopters.

attributes.title: Sea of Thieves - Sneaky Boatjacking
attributes.description: Matt and Geoff set sail in Sea of Thieves closed beta with a mission to sneak onto another pirate's boat and take off with everything they've got.

attributes.title: Halo 5: Playerunknown's Battlegrounds
attributes.description:
Someone created Playerunknown's Battlegrounds inside of Halo 5, because of course they did. Watch Achievement Hunter fight each other for that chicken dinner. 

Download the map here: https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/map-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=unsorted%20guy#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_mapvariant_unsorted%20guy_f0b6d2c6-11ea-472d-83be-cff049e871f1

Download the gametype here: https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=unsorted%20guy#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_unsorted%20guy_bb41c689-9d59-4e39-b321-a4aaed7ba141

attributes.title: GTA V - Rocket Reflect Tunnel
attributes.description:
Achievement Hunter's back for some more rocket reflecting. One team must navigate their helicopter through a dangerous tunnel while trying not to be obliterated by the other team's homing rockets. Good thing there's more flare guns laying around.

Download the map here! http://rsg.ms/6e518b3

attributes.title: GTA V - Extreme Footrace
attributes.description: One track, two directions, and some Phantom Wedges are between those on foot and the finish line. How hard could that be?

attributes.title: GTA V - Poosh Sploosh
attributes.description: Four teams of two try to commandeer a fire truck and 'poosh' everyone off the platform with some 'sploosh.'

attributes.title: GTA V - Shocker X
attributes.description: The boys ain't the biggest fans of this obstacle course. Shocking I know. If you would also like to learn to hate wind towers here's the map by Kyle (KyleDoesGTA). https://socialclub.rockstargames.com/games/gtav/xboxone/jobs/job/iUH9iJyIHkuWtaHy1iohHg

attributes.title: in GTA V - Spin Cycle
attributes.description: It's time to clean up everyone's act. Welcome to the Spin Cycle.

attributes.title: Sea of Thieves - Coop Loop
attributes.description: Sea of Thieves lets you be whatever type of pirate you want to be. If you want to be a pirate that finds treasure, great! If you want to horde a couple hundred chicken coops and sail around the seven seas, that's fine too.

attributes.title: Sea of Thieves - Human Darts
attributes.description:
Aye, matey. It's a Things to Do in Sea of Thieves. It's time to launch some scallywags out of some cannons, aargh.
https://twitter.com/AchievementHunt/status/979115917174034432

attributes.title: GTA V - Floaty Bikey
attributes.description:
Geoff gave Matt the task of smashing a couple classic GTA ideas together into one difficult bike course. This is the frantic struggle of Floaty Bikey.

You can play this impossible map at the link below:
http://rsg.ms/179f61d

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Jenga Tower
attributes.description:
Leave it up to the Spartans to turn a classic children's game into a destructive death trap. Wouldn't be Halo 5 any other way.

Map variant - https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/map-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=Angry%20Polish%2095#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_mapvariant_Angry%20Polish%2095_1c82bdf0-31b8-4b30-a23f-9f0865e1ca2c

Game Variant - https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=Almighty%20Nubs#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_Almighty%20Nubs_576da7c6-dbe9-455d-8bfb-41cae9138315

attributes.title: GTA V - Miniguns VS Mini Coopers
attributes.description: It's miniguns vs mini coopers! Who will win in this thrilling competition of steel vs steel?

attributes.title: Things to Don't in PUBG - Pacifist Party
attributes.description: The boys decide to claim their own private PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds island. No shoot. No gun. All heals. Last pacifist alive wins.

attributes.title: Halo 5 - The Slenderman | The Eight Pages
attributes.description: The boys got a fever. A slender sickness if you will. The only cure is more custom Halo.

attributes.title: Minecraft - Slippy Mountain
attributes.description:
The boys race their boats across icy pathways and up slime trampolines in order to win the best gold tower in all of Minecraft.

Boats are excellent at getting you across the vast reaches of the seas. Clearly, the logical progression is to row them onto slime trampolines and up an icy mountain.

attributes.title: GTA V - Criss Cross KABOOM - Criss Cross Crash
attributes.description: Achievement Hunter jump in some Rocket Voltics and invite 30 of their closest friends to play Criss Cross Crash in GTA V.

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Cornhole - The Hole Master
attributes.description: What do you get when you combine the legendary Grav Hammer, a Warthog, and a giant hole? You get Cornhole: Halo 5 edition.

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Robot Rumble - Robo Geoff Must Kill
attributes.description:
The gang tries out another Halo 5 custom game: Mitake Machine. It's up to four Spartans with rocket launchers to take out one giant robot mech pilot.

Download the map here: https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/map-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=TOKETAKE#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_mapvariant_TOKETAKE_036a1799-f4ef-45db-81c7-f8f60bef8ed6

Download the game type here: https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=TOKETAKE#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_TOKETAKE_179d241a-eeae-4d23-ae2e-2f2153bbc409

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Bowling - Brawl in the Bowling Alley
attributes.description:
The fists fly when Geoff gives Ryan a dirty look. The bar gets raided, blood all over the counters, dead bodies everywhere. Also there is bowling. Map by Littlemonk5
Map download - https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/map-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=Littlemonk5#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_mapvariant_Littlemonk5_c5cd94ce-103c-40ce-bc8e-fea4ea65a3ba
Game type Teams - https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=Littlemonk5#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_Littlemonk5_1ff335db-174f-41b5-8b82-fb8742831ec0
Game Type FFA - https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=Littlemonk5#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_Littlemonk5_69a46382-531c-4a53-b1c3-e6136e1ed8e7

attributes.title: Halo 5 - The Floor is Lava - Four Square
attributes.description: Trapped in a sadistic school yard game, the AH crew must pick a color to decided their fate. But really the only escape is the fiery abyss below.

attributes.title: GTA V - Nasty Booty - Deluxe Bumper Cars
attributes.description:
Matt grabbed some Deluxos to play Deluxe Bumper Cars. The aim is to ram each other over the edge - no flying allowed. Ready. Set. Go!

Check out the map here: http://rsg.ms/d86dc75

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Gang Beasts
attributes.description: We're playing Gang Beasts maps in Halo 5. The goal is the same, except we'll be using hammers to kill our friends.

attributes.title: GTA V - BMX Triple X
attributes.description:
The gang get together to brave a brutal BMX course in GTA V. Determination or heartbreak, who will keep their wits about them?
Map by BobTheDoctor. Download the map here: http://rsg.ms/415e573

attributes.title: Fortnite - FOREtnite Golf
attributes.description: The boys ignore the conventional rules of Fortnite: Battle Royale to play a quick round of golf before the storm comes in. A victory royale may not be in the cards, but someone's doing a celebration dance today.

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Deathrun
attributes.description:
It's time for another DEATHRUN! You couldn't get enough of the boys dying again and again in a race of inevitable fire and glory in Gmod so we put them back on track to endless ash and blood.
https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/map-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=flashplayer911#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_mapvariant_flashplayer911_6ea08f90-826d-4173-92e0-1894e705494b
Map
https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=flashplayer911#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_flashplayer911_a4cc5c18-46ae-4e8c-86a8-184a6db9d7c7
gametype
Brains is the gametype

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Space Invaders
attributes.description:
The guys grab some quarters and boot up an arcade classic, Space Invaders, in Halo 5. One Spartan operates the ""Atari 2600"" while the others play the invaders. Can Achievement Hunter save Earth from alien invasion?

MAP: 
https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/map-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=spartan%20blood%201#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_mapvariant_spartan%20blood%201_6278cf3d-0000-4866-94b3-d326cba5bc0f

GAMETYPE: 
https://www.halowaypoint.com/en-us/games/halo-5-guardians/xbox-one/game-variants?lastModifiedFilter=Everything&sortOrder=BookmarkCount&page=1&gamertag=spartan%20blood%201#ugc_halo-5-guardians_xbox-one_gamevariant_spartan%20blood%201_15226f17-02a2-4e0d-9a97-27ba8100c0d1

attributes.title: Minecraft - Splatoon
attributes.description: Prepare for splatting, inklings! The gang is ready for a little turf war on a Minecraft recreation of Splatoon's Kelp Dome map. You're a block now. You're a boy now. You're a block, you're a boy, you're a block now!

attributes.title: Far Cry 5 - Grenade Tennis
attributes.description: Some say tennis is a boring sport. Those people have never played it with live grenades.

attributes.title: GTA 5 - Balance Ball
attributes.description: We at Achievement Hunter are known for our incredible hand-eye coordination and ability to stay calm under delicate situations. Balancing precariously on a ball while moving it uphill with automatic weapons is definitely in our wheelhouse.

attributes.title: Halo 5 - Pacman X
attributes.description:
The guys are role-playing Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Clyde in this Halo 5 map honoring the classic game Pacman. Watch them trample the unfortunate soul that spawns as Pacman.
Game Map: https://goo.gl/cmFJDJ
Game Variant: https://goo.gl/zA7yBx

attributes.title: Fortnite - Bounce Box
attributes.description: What if you took two jump pads in Fortnite Battle Royale and faced them towards each other? Now what if you did that over and over again in a box shape? You get the Bounce Box.

attributes.title: Spider-Man - Making a Murderer
attributes.description: In Spider-Man's new PS4 game, Spidey goes out of his way to prevent bad guys from being viciously murdered. But Matt knows that's not the life Peter Parker really wants to live.

attributes.title: GTA V - Battle of the Bands
attributes.description:
All new ACHIEVE Collection available now on the RT Store. Buy now at http://bit.ly/2O9RnnO
Everyone's got a party bus. Last band standing wins!

attributes.title: GTA V - Watch Your Head
attributes.description: Geoff rewards the rest of Achievement Hunter for all their hard work with a fun time on the party bus. What could go wrong?

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey - Mannequin Lieutenants
attributes.description: Assassin's Creed Odyssey has all kinds of wonderous ancient things to be discovered. Perhaps the greatest discover is the Mannequin soldiers of the great battle of Sparta. Check them out in action!

attributes.title: Rainbow 6: Siege - The Room
attributes.description: The boys waste all their tools locking an unsuspecting teammate in an airplane in Rainbow 6: Siege.

attributes.title: Things to Don't In Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 - Quad Boat
attributes.description:
Achievement Hunter drops into a warzone in Call of Duty: Blocks Ops 4's Blackout mode in search of a ATV, boat hybrid.
What has four wheels and floats? Quad Boat! Now it's up to the Boat Boys to assemble it.

attributes.title: Call of Duty Black Ops 4 - Pacifist Party
attributes.description: Is it possible to win Call of Duty Black Ops 4: Blackout without firing a single bullet? Well the AH boys are going to give it their best shot!

attributes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 - Ghost Town
attributes.description: Red Dead Redemption 2 has one of the biggest free roam maps ever. It's even bigger when you realize it has a ghost zone parallel to it that you can go to at will. Check out how to get there for yourself!

attributes.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 - Horsin' Around
attributes.description: In Red Dead Redemption 2 nothing is more sacred to you than your noble steed. Sometimes though your horse can have a terrible accident and become useless! But what if you had an army of your favorite horse that also was immune to damage?

attributes.title: Hitman 2 - Fan Fling
attributes.description: Hitman 2 has an unlimited number of ways to eliminate your target. We're not saying one of those is to eliminate like 40 people with the wind...or are we?
